name: Shooty Shooty Bang Bang
description:
In the far future of another universe, magic and machinery have mixed, allowing incredible technical feats such as a massive mining complex that reaches dozens of miles underground, created in the search for more magical materials. 

However, after a plucky young miner digs deeper than she should have, a horde of mysterious creatures flood into the mine, and now, with her foreman’s guidance and the help of her trusty equipment, it’s up to her to fix the problem. Time to get to work!

Credits:
